channel.title: [317] Constant message appearing
channel.description:
On my server, everytime I do an action (e.g climbing stairs, opening up the bank) i get this reoccurring message in the display box:
[IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/1iq9.jpg[/img]
Does anyone know how I can get rid of this?

item.title: [317] Constant message appearing
item.dc:creator: @SirPali SirPali
item.description:
@SirPali wrote:

Goto client.java and search for

case 132:

Case 132 is the case that handles what happens when you click on an object. Search for the sendMessage that sends the text, and delete it.

Read full topic
